dialogs.logoutConfirmText: Log out to continue, or cancel to go to your systems
dialogs.logoutConfirmTitle: You are already logged in to portal.

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: User is disabled and cannot log in to the system.

Owner.label: Owner
Owner.description: Unrestricted access including the ability to share and connect/disconnect system from cloud.

Viewer.label: Viewer
Viewer.description: Can view live video and browse the archive.

Advanced Viewer.label: Advanced Viewer
Advanced Viewer.description: Can view live video, browse the archive, configure cameras, control PTZ etc.

Administrator.label: Administrator
Administrator.description: Unrestricted access including the ability to share.

Custom.label: Custom
Custom.description: Use the desktop client application to set up custom permissions.

cloudAdmin.label: Administrator
cloudAdmin.description: Can configure system and share it.

customRole.label: Custom role
customRole.description: Custom user role specified in the system.

errorCodes.cloudInvalidResponse: Cloud DB returned an unexpected response.
errorCodes.wrongParameters: Some parameters on the form are incorrect.
errorCodes.wrongCode: Account was already activated or confirmation code is incorrect.
errorCodes.forbidden: You do not have permissions to perform this action.
errorCodes.accountNotActivated: This account hasn't been activated yet. Send activation link again
errorCodes.accountAlreadyActivated: This account has been already activated.
errorCodes.emailNotFound: This email has not been registered in portal.
errorCodes.emailAlreadyExists: This email address has been already registered.
errorCodes.systemForbidden: You don't have access to this system.
errorCodes.cantEditYourself: Changing own permissions is not allowed.
errorCodes.cantEditAdmin: This user already has administrator permissions.
errorCodes.cantOpenClient: VMS_NAME application was not detected. Download

passwordRequirements.minLengthMessage: Password must contain at least 8 characters
passwordRequirements.requiredMessage: Use only latin letters, numbers and keyboard symbols, avoid leading and trailing spaces.
passwordRequirements.weakMessage: Use numbers, upper and lower case letters and special characters to make your password stronger.
passwordRequirements.commonMessage: This password is in top most popular passwords in the world

sharing.confirmOwner: You are about to change the owner of the system. You will lose owner permissions. This action is irreversible. Are you sure?

system.confirmUnshareFromMe: You are about to disconnect this system from your account. You will not be able to access this system via cloud anymore. Are you sure?
system.confirmUnshare: You are going to restrict the access to this user. Are you sure?
system.successDisconnected: System was successfully disconnected from PRODUCT_NAME
system.successDeleted: System {systemName} was successfully deleted from your account

downloads.noClientDetectedTitle: Install VMS_NAME to view your system
